element.hint: Default - low risk
element.label: Low

element.hint: Warning - Risk Moderate, should show with date based warning flags
element.label: Warning

element.hint: Critical Risk - will be reported with overdue tasks as high risk
element.label: Critical

element.hint: Trivial - very low impact
element.label: Trivial

element.hint: Minor - small impact Expected
element.label: Minor

element.hint: Moderate - Mid level impact to scope, time or quality is expected
element.label: Moderate

element.hint: Major - impact is high and significant
element.label: Major

element.hint: Extreme - highest criticality level for impact, expect delays, poor quality or failure
element.label: Extreme

element.hint: Rare - doesn't happen oftern at all
element.label: Rare

element.hint: Unlikely - doesn't happen much
element.label: Unlikely

element.hint: Moderate - happens more often - up to 50 percent of the time
element.label: Moderate

element.hint: Likely - this will most likely happen
element.label: Likely

element.hint: Very likely - this will probably happen - it will be surprising when it does not
element.label: Very likely
